io.discloader.discloader.common

Class DiscLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.common.DiscLoader

  • public class DiscLoader
extends Object
    The DiscLoader client object

    How To Use

     
 public static void main(String... args) {
        // create a new instance of DiscLoader
        DiscLoader loader = new DiscLoader();
 
        // time to login
        loader.login(TOKEN);

 }
    Author:
    Perry Berman, Zach Waldron

      • DiscLoader

        public DiscLoader()
        The DiscLoader client object

        How To Use

         
 public static void main(String... args) {
        // create a new instance of DiscLoader
        DiscLoader loader = new DiscLoader();
 
        // time to login
        loader.login(TOKEN);

 }

      • DiscLoader

        public DiscLoader(DLOptions options)
         
 public static void main(String... args) {
        DLOptions options = new DLOptions("TOKEN", "PREFIX");
 
        // create a new instance of DiscLoader
        DiscLoader loader = new DiscLoader(options);
 
        // time to login
        loader.login();

 }
        Parameters:
        options - Options to be passed to the client

      • DiscLoader

        public DiscLoader(int shard,
                  int shards)
        The DiscLoader client object

        How To Use

        Shard Manager jar

         
 public static void main(String... args) {
        int shards = 10;
 
        ShardManager manager = new ShardManager(shards);
        manager.start();
 
 }

        Shard jar

         
 // main method in shard jar
 public static void main(String... args) {
        // create a new instance of DiscLoader shard
        DiscLoader loader = new DiscLoader(System.getenv("shards"), System.getenv("shard"));
 
        // make it do it's startup stuff
        loader.startup();
 
        // since it's probably done, time to login
        loader.login(TOKEN);

 }
        Parameters:
        shards - The total number of shards
        shard - The number id of this shard
        Since:
        0.0.3

      • login

        public CompletableFuture<DiscLoader> login()
        Makes the client log into the gateway. using a predefined token.
        You can use DLOptions to set the token when you create a new DiscLoader object.
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that completes with this if successful.

      • login

        public CompletableFuture<DiscLoader> login(String token)
        Connects the current instance of the loader into Discord's gateway servers
        Parameters:
        token - your API token
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that completes with this if successful.
